relation: Name of baseline to drop from the system
If TRUE, the pair of snapshots associated with the baseline will also be dropped. Otherwise, only the baseline is removed.
Database Identifier for baseline. If NULL, this takes the database identifier for the local database. Defaults to NULL.

textBeforeTable: Table 162-26 DROP_BASELINE Parameters Parameters dbid IN NUMBER DEFAULT NULL); cascade IN BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, baseline_name IN VARCHAR2, DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.DROP_BASELINE(  Syntax  This procedure drops a baseline. DROP_BASELINE Procedure      If you query the DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT view after the CREATE_SNAPSHOT action, you will see one more snapshot ID added to the Workload Repository. EXECUTE DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.CREATE_SNAPSHOT();  This example creates a manual snapshot at the TYPICAL level: Examples     Flush level for the snapshot is either 'TYPICAL' or 'ALL' flush_level Description Parameter Table 162-25 CREATE_SNAPSHOT Parameters Parameters RETURN NUMBER; flush_level IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'TYPICAL') DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.CREATE_SNAPSHOT( flush_level IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'TYPICAL'); DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.CREATE_SNAPSHOT(  Syntax  This function and procedure create snapshots. In the case of the function, the snapshot ID is returned. CREATE_SNAPSHOT Function and Procedure
textAfterTable: Examples This example drops the baseline 'oltp_peakload_bl' without dropping the underlying snapshots:  EXECUTE DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.DROP_BASELINE ( baseline_name => 'oltp_peakload_bl'); If you query the DBA_HIST_BASELINE view after the DROP_BASELINE action, you will see the specified baseline definition is removed. You can query the DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT view to find that the underlying snapshots are left intact. DROP_BASELINE_TEMPLATE Procedure This procedure removes a template that is no longer needed. Syntax  DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.DROP_BASELINE_TEMPLATE( template_name IN VARCHAR2, dbid IN NUMBER DEFAULT NULL); Parameters Table 162-27 DROP_BASELINE_TEMPLATE Procedure Parameters Parameter Description template_name Name of the template to remove dbid Database Identifier for baseline. If NULL, this takes the database identifier for the local database. Defaults to NULL. DROP_SNAPSHOT_RANGE Procedure This procedure drops a range of snapshots. Syntax
